商品名稱: MYHALF 女款 夏威夷 襯衫 柔軟 涼爽 夏季 夏威夷 襯衫 花卉 熱帶印花 V 領 T 恤 短袖 鈕扣上衣
留言內容: It's hard to find a Hawaiian shirt that doesn't cost an arm and a leg so when I saw this for sale at a reasonable price, I bought it. I didn't have the highest expectations but I was SO SURPRISED how much I love love love this shirt. The colors are VIBRANT and the shirt fit my awkwardly obese body well. The fabric is SUPER soft and comfortable. My only concern is that I don't think it wicks moisture well. So if you tend to sweat a lot, this may not be a great shirt for you. Otherwise, I think it was a fun purchase and I'm really surprised it worked out as well as it did.

商品名稱: MYHALF 女款 夏威夷 襯衫 柔軟 涼爽 夏季 夏威夷 襯衫 花卉 熱帶印花 V 領 T 恤 短袖 鈕扣上衣
留言內容: The colors are very beautiful in these floral shirts and PERFECT for Spring & Summer! The "polyester" can be hot in Summer but they are light weight and thus can be layered with a "cotton" or "breathable" layer underneath. I sized up to "XL" from my normal size "L" because most things I buy here on Amazon run SMALL! These shirts are true to size! That said, I re-purchased them in size "L" plus a few MORE designs including the HALLOWEEN! I LOVE IT! ; ) I'm keeping the "XL" for over sized comfort.UPDATE: 03/20/23It turns out that the size "L" that I ordered were too small so I am returning them. So for me, "XL" is a little too big and "L" is too tight and I cannot button it. I decided to re-order more styles in size "XL". They really are not so big that they look sloppy. I LOVE the new "stars & stripes" style! Keeping them all! : )

商品名稱: MYHALF 女款 夏威夷 襯衫 柔軟 涼爽 夏季 夏威夷 襯衫 花卉 熱帶印花 V 領 T 恤 短袖 鈕扣上衣
留言內容: Like the flow/ fit of the shirt, and the polyester texture is fine and a bit silky.  Appreciated the variety of available colors, and I chose one that really goes w/ a lot of my other clothes.  Washes easily, and I just hung it on a hanger to dry as didn't want to mess w/ dryer.  It is an easy, casual shirt.  The small worked nicely for me and I am 5'4', and weigh abt 115.  Though I would have liked the sleeves to be a bit longer to better completely  cover my horrible upper arms, this one ' just makes' it, and I will keep it for all the above features.

留言內容: What a nice change from the oversized, stiff Hawaiian shirts of years past.  This shirt moves with you, has a great length, and vivid colors!

商品名稱: MYHALF 女款 夏威夷 襯衫 柔軟 涼爽 夏季 夏威夷 襯衫 花卉 熱帶印花 V 領 T 恤 短袖 鈕扣上衣
留言內容: The fabric is a silky polyester which holds wrinkles very stubbornly.  I hung it for a month before our Hawaiian party but the wrinkles didn't fall out.  I sprayed with fabic wrinkle releaser which didn't work either.  Then I tried to steam the fabric lightly, afraid it may melt.  It is still wrinkled from the package it arrived in.  I wear a Med in most shirts but ordered a Large in this since it is made in China and sizes get weird there.  The Large was too large so I switched with my husband's Med he ordered from another vendor which was too small for him, also from China.  We made it work.

商品名稱: MYHALF 女款 夏威夷 襯衫 柔軟 涼爽 夏季 夏威夷 襯衫 花卉 熱帶印花 V 領 T 恤 短袖 鈕扣上衣
